channel.title: Crown Sprite Error
channel.description:
Well can anyone tell me how to edit my crown, because when i open it under [b]windows photo gallery[/b] then edit it under [b]paint[/b] a popup will appear saying [code]C:Users\All\AppData\Local\Temp\Rar$DI26.957\mod_icons1.PNG Paint cannot read this file. This is not a valid bitmap file, or its format is not currently supported[/code]
Well yeah its kind of annoying because i'm trying to edit the [b]owners[/b] Crown.
Any idea's on how to edit it [b]please post[/b]. Anything you dont understand or need to ask a question on this topic [b]please post[/b].
[b]By the way Chassy. Thanks for moving my post[/b]

item.title: Crown Sprite Error
item.dc:creator: @owned654321241 owned654321241
item.description:
@owned654321241 wrote:

Not 100% sure but it could be one of two things.

  1. Your trying to mess witha a read only file
    or
  2. Save the file as a .JPEG then edit it and resave it as a .BMP

Read full topic

item.title: Crown Sprite Error
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

i got some of these sprites that i made my self. have fun with them. just click here, extract them.YOU NEED TO PUT THEM ALL INTO YOURE SPRITS FOLDER!. if u don’t this won’t work…what they look like:
owner crown = black/red
admin crown = gold/silver
mod crown (1) = silver front; gold back
mod crown (2\donator) = black front; purple back.

have fun and hope this helps bro!

http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=45284c5c515cfa83111096d429abd36010c3b07c0af77ce7c95965eaa7bc68bc

-MA.

Read full topic
